alert.note: Alert for Pottawattamie (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Omaha (Eastern Nebraska and Southeastern Iowa - Omaha Valley)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued May 07 at 10:31PM CDT until May 08 at 1:00AM CDT by NWS Omaha
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1115 PM CDT FOR NORTHEASTERN POTTAWATTAMIE COUNTY... At 1031 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Minden, or 14 miles southwest of Harlan, moving northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and half dollar size hail. SOURCE...Public. At 1013 PM, half dollar size hail was reported in McClelland. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Shelby. HAIL THREAT...OBSERVED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.25 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
